chunk_text: You will also have the use of the luxury restroom trailer that is appointed with heat and air conditioning, running water for the sinks and flushable toilets. A new handicapped accessible family bathroom is available by the mini park as well. #### Do you have indoor restrooms? Yes. You will need to place all trash in the provided black trash bags and placed in the designated dumpster location. There is no fee as long as the trash is placed in the dumpster. #### Do I need to take out my trash?
